item.title: Theiving Stalls Help
item.dc:creator: @I_like_rods4 I like rods4
item.description:
@I_like_rods4 wrote:

public void TheifStall(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int emote) { if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction < actionInterval) return; if(playerLevel[17] >= lvlReq) { actionInterval = 4000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); setAnimation(emote); sM("You take from the stall.."); sM(message); addItem(item, itemAmount); addSkillXP(XPamount, 170); } else if(playerLevel[17] < lvlReq) { sM("You need a theiving level of "+lvlReq+" to theif from this stall."); }

also

public void TheifStall(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int emote) { if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction < actionInterval) return; if(playerLevel[17] >= lvlReq) { actionInterval = 4000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); setAnimation(emote); sM("You take from the stall.."); sM(message); addItem(995, 1000000); addSkillXP(XPamount, 17); } else if(playerLevel[17] < lvlReq) { sM("You need a theiving level of "+lvlReq+" to theif from this stall."); } }

} if(objectID == 4878){ TheifStall("stall", "and recieve a scimitar", 77, 90*playerLevel[17], Item.randomScimitar(), 1, 0x340); } if(objectID == 2561){ TheifStall("cake stall", "and recieve a baked cake", 53, 75*playerLevel[17], 1891, 1, 0x340); } if(objectID == 4876){ TheifStall("General Stall", "And Recieve Some Coins!", 20, 102*playerLevel[17], 995, 50000*playerLevel[17], 0x340); setAnimation(881); } if(objectID == 2562){ TheifStall("gem stall", "and receive 100,000 gold.", 80, 7000*playerLevel[17], 995, 100000, 0x340); } if(objectID == 2560){ TheifStall("silk stall", "and receive 25,000 gold.", 1, 600*playerLevel[17], 995, 25000, 0x340); } if(objectID == 2565){ TheifStall("silver stall", "and receive 50,000 gold.", 50, 1050*playerLevel[17], 995, 50000, 0x340); } if(objectID == 4708){ TheifStall("vegetable stall", "and recieve a tomatoe", 60, 35*playerLevel[17], 1982, 1, 0x340); }

Please help!!

Read full topic
